forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High near 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low near 50F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 57F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. High 16C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High around 60F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. Low near 10C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 56F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 45F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High around 55F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 7C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low around 45F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High 14C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High 57F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low near 50F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High around 60F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 61F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High near 15C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 59F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 58F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
